mapper.sql: INCOMING_OID, INCOMING_DESC, AMOUNT, INCOMING_TYPE, CONFIRMED, OWNER_OID, INCOMING_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, SEQ_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INCOMING(INCOMING_DESC, AMOUNT, INCOMING_TYPE, CONFIRMED, OWNER_OID, INCOMING_DATE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY) VALUES (#{incomingDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incomingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confirmed,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ownerOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incomingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE INCOMING
SEQ_NO = SEQ_NO + 1,
INCOMING_DESC = #{incomingDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INCOMING_TYPE = #{incomingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFIRMED = #{confirmed,jdbcType=BIT},
OWNER_OID = #{ownerOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INCOMING_DATE = #{incomingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
WHERE INCOMING_OID = #{incomingOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE INCOMING SET SEQ_NO = SEQ_NO + 1, INCOMING_DESC = #{incomingDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INCOMING_TYPE = #{incomingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIRMED = #{confirmed,jdbcType=BIT}, OWNER_OID = #{ownerOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INCOMING_DATE = #{incomingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} WHERE INCOMING_OID = #{incomingOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
